description:
doc: GCC 4.8.1 is not updated to Go 1.1

I will try again for 4.8.2.

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go

*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=6c64135360c2 ***

doc: GCC 4.8.1 is not updated to Go 1.1

I will try again for 4.8.2.

R=golang-dev, minux.ma
CC=golang-dev
https://codereview.appspot.com/9663045

IMO, we should backport this to release-branch.go1.1
so that people won't get wrong info when they read
go1.1 release note from Go 1.1.1.

On Mon, Jun 10, 2013 at 12:06 PM,  <minux.ma@gmail.com> wrote:
> IMO, we should backport this to release-branch.go1.1
> so that people won't get wrong info when they read
> go1.1 release note from Go 1.1.1.
>
> https://codereview.appspot.com/9663045/

I guess that makes sense to me.  Andrew, can you do that?  Thanks.

Ian

subject: code review 9663045: doc: GCC 4.8.1 is not updated to Go 1.1
